# jQuery PopBox jQuery PopBox is a simple balloon UI element inspired by High Rise. # Usage jQuery PopBox requires a specific HTML structure in order to work. There is also a small stylesheet that can be used. ```html
Click Here!

``` Invoke the plugin by calling it on a selector. ```html ``` If there are any naming conflicts, they can be overridden. ```html ``` ## Screenshot ![jQuery PopBox Screenshot](https://github.com/gristmill/jquery-popbox/raw/master/screenshot.png) ## Credits jQuery PopBox developed by [Sean Behan](http://twitter.com/_sbehan) at [Gristmill.io](http://gristmill.io) It is inspired by the balloon UI element found in 37signals.com's HighRise CRM.
